mapper.insert: insert into user_history(user_id, seat_no, login_time, logout_time) values(#{userId}, #{seatNo}, #{loginTime}, #{logoutTime})
insert into orders (user_id, order_date, code) values (#{userId}, #{orderDate},#{code})
insert into payment( ORDER_ID, PAYMENT_DATE, PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE, PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE) values( #{orderId}, #{paymentDate}, #{paymentMethodCode}, #{paymentTypeCode} )
mapper.select: select item_id, selling_price from item where item_type_code = 'IT001' and item_id != 'ITEM000001'
